text: vyaktamaya telivukalum keant mump yusuph ninnalute atutt varikayuntayittuntâ€Œ. appeal addeham ninnalkk keantuvannatine parri ninnal sansayattilayikkeaneîtayirunnu. ennitt addeham maranappettappeal iddehattinu sesam allahu ini oru dutaneyum niyeagikkukaye illa enn ninnal parannu. aprakaram atikramakariyum sansayaluvumayittullatarea avare allahu valiterrikkunnu
